column2: A group of national security experts, military intelligence experts, issued a very concerning statement about Senator Sanders's views on foreign policy and national security, pointing out some of the comments he has made on these issues, such as inviting Iranian troops into Syria to try to resolve the conflict there putting them right at the doorstep of Israel.
column4: Says Bernie Sanders advocated putting "Iranian troops into Syria to try and resolve the conflict there. Putting them right on the doorstep of Israel."

column2: They're worried about the future of their kids, and yet almost all new income and wealth is going to the top 1 percent.
column4: Americans "are working longer hours for low wages . . . and yet almost all new income and wealth is going to the top 1 percent."

column2: Workers today are working longer hours for lower wages.
column4: Americans "are working longer hours for low wages . . . and yet almost all new income and wealth is going to the top 1 percent."

column2: I waited until it had actually been negotiated because I did want to give the benefit of the doubt to the administration.
column4: Says as secretary of state she was reserving judgment about the TransPacific Partnership and "hoped it would be the gold standard."

column2: I waited until it had actually been negotiated because I did want to give the benefit of the doubt to the administration.
column4: I waited until (the TransPacific Partnership trade agreement) had actually been negotiated before deciding whether to endorse it.
